title: Scorched Earth Renekton Team Builder Bug
body: Team Builder thinks that Scorched Earth Renekton is an INVALID_SKIN and wont let me use it.

replies.body:
Hey Inept Maverick! 

Thanks for reporting this! We're currently looking into the issue!
my dark Valkyrie Diana skin is saying the same thing for teambuilder

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=p16LW3ev,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-14T17:33:40.147+0000)
>
> Hey Inept Maverick! 
> 
> Thanks for reporting this! We're currently looking into the issue!

Ok, so after a hard restart of my League client, it was able to come back but for some reason didn't appear in the scroll box for skins initially before I extied and re-entered Team Builder. Its strange and I dont know exactly what is causing it since I got on, opened Team Builder, and it happened.
